channel.title: Does Vista effect things?
channel.description:
Okay so i just bought a new pc and it came with windows vista home premuimin or wut ever and when i compile i get the java is not reconized as external and batch file and stuff and runserver says cannot find path specifed.
And i set the right envorimental paths and things. ill tell you them any one and i have jdk 6.5
Okay i made a new variable called CLASSPATH and the code i put in is [code]CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin;%CLASSPATH%; [/code]
also i made a new variabled PATH and the code i used for that is [code]C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin [/code]
Does any one kno if i messed up or is vista a problem?
